name: Pandora'sBox
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: pandora's box
des: Just like the original, Pandora’s Box contains numerous mysteries and maladies. Opening the box will unleash something upon you and anyone in the room. All you need to do is ask your Alexa to open Pandora’s Box, and something will be let out of the box.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
